name: De_Sync
description:
NOTE: While the web version is playable, it does have some lag issues on Firefox. The game is best experienced either through Google Chrome or the Windows executable which you can download below

Please hit the "?" Button on the main menu below "PLAY" for a list of controls

De-Sync's core mechanic is the "De-Sync" that occurs to the player on death. The next life, if you chose to "De-Sync", there will be a "hologram" version of the player the repeats all of the actions you performed on your previous life. Use your past life to your advantage! The goal is to kill every enemy on a stage. Guns have limited bullets, but enemies can also be killed by throwing your gun at them.

Made with Tyler Pelaez (https://defectivemelon.itch.io/) for Mini Jam 63: https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-63-future?fbclid=IwAR2h1_pGTshD9PpJtpsXG1JWgGQxmI1dZ1ITQUreGSmodVlZEJMzO8btO38

Art assets by me (Matthew Chuang/AceDegenerate), SFX/Music by Tyler (DefectiveMelon), coding by both of us
